messages.title: Half a Year of Us
messages.content:
Maki, itâ€™s been six months since the day our story began, and I still find myself falling for you in new ways every single day. These months werenâ€™t just time passing â€” they were chapters written in laughter, in late-night confessions, in moments of quiet trust. Youâ€™ve faced storms that would have broken anyone, yet you keep walking forward with strength and grace. And through it all, you let me be beside you. 

I want you to know how deeply I admire your courage. Youâ€™re walking through your hardest chapter and still holding my hand like itâ€™s the most natural thing in the world. Youâ€™ve given me a love thatâ€™s raw, soft, chaotic, and breathtakingly real. Thank you for letting me love you, for letting me be your warmth on the cold days, and for being mine. Six months down, a lifetime of soft mornings and loud laughter to go. ğŸŒ¿ğŸ’–

messages.title: Bali, and Everything After
messages.content:
I will never forget the way the wind touched your hair that evening in Bali, the golden light making everything feel like a dream. You leaned in, and in that single kiss, the world slowed down. It wasnâ€™t just a moment â€” it was the moment I felt the weight of how much you meant to me. Since then, every laugh, every baby-voiced â€˜waen waenâ€™, every time you looked at me with those eyes that say, â€˜I choose you,â€™ has only pulled me deeper into your orbit. 

I think about how you treated Shibu like your own little sister, how naturally your love wrapped around the people I love. I think about the quiet nights when you tell me, with your whole heart, that Iâ€™m the one you want. I think about how youâ€™ve made this love feel like a home I didnâ€™t know I was missing. You are my soft place to land, my favorite chaos, my heartbeat in human form. ğŸŒºâœ¨

messages.title: Whatâ€™s Waiting for Us
messages.content:
Every step ahead with you feels like the most beautiful promise. The Philippines, where Iâ€™ll stand before your parents with all the love and certainty I carry in my heart. Vietnam, where weâ€™ll seal our story with a promise, where Iâ€™ll look at you and know Iâ€™ve found my forever. And then India â€” not as a final destination, but as a quiet, honest moment where Iâ€™ll ask my parents for their blessing to bring you fully into my world. Not because you need permission to be loved, but because love â€” real love â€” builds bridges. 

Our 6-month anniversary isnâ€™t just a celebration of time; itâ€™s a celebration of everything weâ€™ve fought for, laughed through, cried into, and held on to. Itâ€™s us standing in the middle of the storm, choosing each other. And Iâ€™ll keep choosing you, Maki, every day. In the noisy world, you are my quiet certainty. In every lifetime, Iâ€™ll find my way back to you. ğŸ’ğŸŒ¿âœ¨
